
{{alias}}( λ, k )
    Returns a pseudorandom number drawn from a Weibull distribution.

    If `λ <= 0` or `k <= 0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    If either `λ` or `k` is `NaN`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    λ: scalar
        Shape parameter.

    k: scalar
        Scale parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    r: double
        Pseudorandom number.

    Examples
    --------
    > var r = {{alias}}( 2.0, 5.0 );


{{alias}}.factory( [λ, k, ][options] )
    Returns a pseudorandom number generator (PRNG) for generating pseudorandom
    numbers drawn from a Weibull distribution.

    If provided `λ` and `k`, the returned PRNG returns random variates drawn
    from the specified distribution.

    If not provided `λ` and `k`, the returned PRNG requires that both `λ` and
    `k` be provided at each invocation.

    Parameters
    ----------
    λ: scalar (optional)
        Shape parameter.

    k: scalar (optional)
        Scale parameter.

    options: Object (optional)
        Options.

    options.seed: any (optional)
        Pseudorandom number generator seed.

    Returns
    -------
    rand: Function
        Pseudorandom number generator (PRNG).

    Examples
    --------
    // Basic usage:
    > var rand = {{alias}}.factory();
    > var r = rand( 0.1, 1.5 );
    > r = rand( 2.0, 3.14 );

    // Provide `λ` and `k`:
    > rand = {{alias}}.factory( 0.1, 1.5 );
    > r = rand();
    > r = rand();


{{alias}}.NAME
    Generator name.

    Examples
    --------
    > var name = {{alias}}.NAME
    'weibull'


{{alias}}.PRNG
    Underlying pseudorandom number generator.

    Examples
    --------
    > var prng = {{alias}}.PRNG;


{{alias}}.SEED
    Pseudorandom number generator seed.

    Examples
    --------
    > var seed = {{alias}}.SEED;

    See Also
    --------
